commitments.commitment: Honey will be available through Palmyra Express and at Rare Evo
commitments.timeline: less than two months for Rare Evo
commitments.quote: this honey is going to be available through another one of our portals called Palmyra Express really soon and we're going to have it at Rare Evo which is coming up in less than two months

commitments.commitment: Orders will be fulfilled through the ZenGate U.S. entity for U.S. and Canada
commitments.quote: these orders are going to be fulfilled through the ZenGate U.S. entity

key_facts.fact: Almost 80% of all honey in the West is not real honey according to a study
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Several thousand producers are on chain for honey traceability with Nature's Nectar in Zambia
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Pure honey does not have an expiration date
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Tea has approximately a two-year shelf life
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: European Union Deforestation Regulation (EUDR) goes into effect next year requiring mandatory traceability
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman
